front.title: Moving MCAST.NET into the ARPA infrastructure top level domain

abstract.t: This document proposes to migrate the MCAST.NET domain into the ARPA top level domain, which is dedicated to infrastructure support. It also provides a maintenance policy for the new MCAST.ARPA domain, related registrations in IN-ADDR.ARPA and describes the migration process. This document updates RFC 5771 and forms part of BCP 51.
